FuncDef: The display debugging packet all command displays the tracing status of all protocol packets.
Examples: [Y] : The packet of specified type will display
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the following operation is performed, you can run the
display debugging packet all command to view the tracing status of all protocol packets.
Run the debugging packet filter command to set the filter condition for tracing protocol packets.Run the debugging packet timeout command to set the timeout interval for tracing protocol packets.
